resources.string: To make XpRate work, we log user data and share it with service providers.\n Click above button to accept XpRate\'s.
Create an account to review and rate any profile or organisation. Make sure to follow authors to whose rating matters to you.

If your provided email exist in our XpRate system, then you will receive the password reset mail shortly. You can reset the your XpRate password by one click in you received mail. Please check mail inbox or other mail receiving folders of email.

We have sent you a verification email.Please check mail inbox or other mail receiving folders of email like social/promotions etc. Just click the link you received in mail. Then login with your password.
Password must be eight characters long and should contains a digit, a lower, upper case letter, a special character (?= *[@#$%^&+=])
